rules_text:
When this artifact enters, if it was cast, return up to one target creature or Vehicle card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
notes: 2.0.1: Dropped flying to save on card space and the fusion art to save on card space and reduce how efficiently it ends the game.
